org.odk.collect.android.permissions

Class PermissionsProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.odk.collect.android.permissions.PermissionsProvider

  • public class PermissionsProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    PermissionsProvider allows all permission related messages and checks to be encapsulated in one area so that classes don't have to deal with this responsibility; they just receive a callback that tells them if they have been granted the permission they requested.
